  • Genres: Soundtrack, Classical, Electronic, Industrial, Experimental.
  • Specifications: PCM, 44100 Hz, 16-bit Stereo, 1411 kbps (320 kbps mp3 digital release)
  • Composer: Andrew Oudot.
  • Exaella OVA Opening Song: Melody and Lyrics by Andrew Oudot, feat Akari Yamamoto (あかり山本).
  • Released in 2012.
